title: sweeteye
author: sweeteye
content: Hereâ€™s a nice piece of collectibe holiday swag for all of you Ballet fans that was sent out in December 2020 with a note from Bobby Lee. The gift box includes a 24K Gold plated VIP covered REAL Ballet Wallet, as well as a nice looking black Ballet branded coffee cup with gold plated handle that does a cool thing when filled with hot liquid!Never used, only demo'd!STARTING BID: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to 4 decimal places**END TIME: Friday, November 11th, 2022, 17:00:00 EST (5pm NYC)**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.ESCROW: If desired, no problem with mutually agreed upon agentSHIPPING: Buyerâ€™s expense based on location and preferencePAYMENT: BTC only to bc1qwyffx45azmwkf7c64ph6jluf2hf9n87plqsy0l

comments.body: Haha my cup has been used every morning since I got it last year, it did not age very well lol but the color change effect still works ðŸ˜‰ .005BTC
